snippet: Growing numbers of bears and other animals are descending from mountains and mesas, desperate to eat whatever they can find before winter arrives.
abstract: Growing numbers of bears and other wild animals are descending from mountains and mesas across the United States in search of food after record-breaking summer drought killed off the vegetation that normally sustains them.
lead_paragraph: Growing numbers of bears and other animals are descending from mountains and mesas, desperate to eat whatever they can find before winter arrives.

headline.seo: Their Food Scarce From Drought, Animals Dine in Town
headline.main: With Their Food Scarce From Drought, More Animals Try Dining in Town
headline.print_headline: With Their Food Scarce From Drought, More Animals Try Dining in Town
